This Saturday, Durham University musicians are coming to join us up in Edinburgh on their UK tour! Let’s give ‘em a warm welcome!</h6>

EUMS are working with Durham University and together we’re pleased to be able to offer £4 tickets</b> to all University of Edinburgh students and EUMS members.  Just bring along your matriculation card or if you’re a non-student member of the Edinburgh University Music Society, bring along your EUMS Membership Card to receive this discount.</p>

And what will you be getting for your money? Durham University Chamber Choir are bringing Edinburgh a fantastic concert of British choral music, featuring Britten, Mealor, Wood, Macmillan, and featuring the première of Ben Rowarth's Unto Dust</em>.</p>

Check out the Facebook event here...</a></h2>

We hope to see you there!</p>
